name: Trainer 1
Dialogue: What's cool? Trading POKEMON!

name: Trainer 1 after
Dialogue: I trade POKEMON with my friends!

name: Trainer 2
Dialogue: Oh, you're a little cutie!

name: Trainer 2 after
Dialogue: I forgive you! I can take it!

name: Trainer 3
Dialogue: You look gentle, so I think I can beat you!

name: Trainer 3 after
Dialogue: I'm afraid of BIKERs, they look so ugly and mean!

name: Trainer 4
Dialogue: Hey kid! C'mon! I just got these!

name: Trainer 4 after
Dialogue: You only live once, so I live as an outlaw! TEAM ROCKET RULES!

name: Trainer 5
Dialogue: Fork over all your cash when you lose to me, kid!

name: Trainer 5 after
Dialogue: I was just joking about the money!

name: Trainer 6
Dialogue: I raise POKEMON because I live alone!

name: Trainer 6 after
Dialogue: I just like going home to be with my POKEMON!

name: Trainer 7
Dialogue: Let me try out the POKEMON I just got in a trade!

name: Trainer 7 after
Dialogue:
You can't change the nickname of any POKEMON you get in a trade.
Only the Original Trainer can.

name: Trainer 8
Dialogue: Hmm? My birds are shivering! You're good, aren't you?

name: Trainer 8 after
Dialogue:
Did you know that moves like EARTHQUAKE don't have any effect
on birds?

name: Trainer 9
Dialogue: When I whistle, I can summon bird POKEMON!

name: Trainer 9 after
Dialogue: Maybe I'm not cut out for battles.

name: Trainer 10
Dialogue: Want to play with my POKEMON?

name: Trainer 10 after
Dialogue: I'll go train with weaker people.
Are you working on a POKEDEX? PROF.OAK's AIDE came by here.

Hi! Remember me? I'm PROF.OAK's AIDE! If you caught 50 kinds of
POKEMON, I'm supposed to give you an EXP.ALL! So, Player! Have you
caught at least 50 kinds of POKEMON?
Oh. I see. When you get 50 kinds, come back for EXP.ALL.

Let's see... Uh-oh! You have caught only <##> kinds of POKEMON!
You need 50 kinds if you want the EXP.ALL.

Great! You have caught <##> kinds of POKEMON! Congratulations!
Here you go!

EXP.ALL gives EXP points to all the POKEMON with you, even if they
don't fight. It does, however, reduce the amount of EXP for each
POKEMON. If you don't need it, you should store it via PC.
